english_translation: Conversation and discourse that expands the mind's joy
An invitation to peace, and the end of anxiety.

kannada_original: ಮರೆತಳಲ ನೆನೆ ಒಳಿತ, ನಡೆ ನಗೆಯ ನದಿತಟದಿ ;
english_transliteration: Maretalaḷa nene oḷita, naḍe nageya naditaṭadi ;
english_translation: Forget sorrow, remember goodness, walk on the riverbank of laughter;
The mind is the native place of jasmine - Dear Rama.
